sentences.en: an eye witness (= someone who sees an event ) to the robbery
sentences.cn: 抢劫案的一名目击者

sentences.en: Ask a friend to witness your signature.
sentences.cn: 请一位朋友给你的签名作证。

sentences.en: Bad economic times can result in political dictatorships. Witness Germany in the 1930s.
sentences.cn: 经济不景气时代可能导致政治独裁，20世纪30年代的德国便是证明。

sentences.en: God be my witness, sir, I didn't!.
sentences.cn: 老天作证，先生，我没干！。

sentences.en: He gave witness on behalf of an accused person.
sentences.cn: 他为被告作证.

sentences.en: He is expected to be the key witness at the trial.
sentences.cn: 他将成为审判的关键证人。

sentences.en: His girlfriend had gone into the witness box and taken the oath.
sentences.cn: 他的女朋友进入证人席并立了誓。

sentences.en: Police have appealed for witnesses to come forward.
sentences.cn: 警方呼吁目击者站出来。

sentences.en: Several residents claim to have witnessed the attack.
sentences.cn: 几位居民称目击了袭击事件。

sentences.en: She brought several persons of good credit to witness to her reputation.
sentences.cn: 她带来几位很有声誉的人物为她的名誉作证.

sentences.en: She thumped her hand on the witness box.
sentences.cn: 她抬手重重地砸在证人席上。

sentences.en: The convictions rest solely on disputed witness and confessional statements.
sentences.cn: 仅仅根据有争议的目击者证言和供词就定了罪。

sentences.en: The court subpoenaed her to appear as a witness.
sentences.cn: 法庭传唤她出庭作证。

sentences.en: The defence is expected to call them as witnesses .
sentences.cn: 预计辩方会传召他们作为证人。

sentences.en: The defence is expected to call them as witnesses.
sentences.cn: 预计辩方会传召他们作为证人。

sentences.en: The judge reminded the witness that he was still under oath.
sentences.cn: 法官提醒证人,他已发过誓要说实话.

sentences.en: The jury did not believe the witness'cock and bull story.
sentences.cn: 陪审团不相信证人的无稽之谈.

sentences.en: The plaintiff's sole witness, a gambler and layabout, was easily discredited.
sentences.cn: 原告唯一的证人嗜赌成性，游手好闲，其证词一下子就被推翻了。

sentences.en: The witness was cross-examined for over two hours.
sentences.cn: 那位证人被盘问了两个多小时。

sentences.en: to suborn a witness
sentences.cn: 收买证人

sentences.en: Too often children are witness to a disturbing amount of violence.
sentences.cn: 孩子们经常会目睹暴力事件，其数量之多令人不安。

sentences.en: What follows is an eye-witness account.
sentences.cn: 接下来的是目击者的陈述。

phrases.phrase: as God is my witness (或 God be my witness)
phrases.tran_cn: 上帝作证，老天作证（用于确认事实）

phrases.phrase: call someone or something to witness

trans.tran_en: someone who sees a crime or an accident and can describe what happened
to see something happen, especially a crime or accident

trans.tran_cn: 目击； 为…作证， 证明
trans.tran_en: used to introduce an example that proves something you have just mentioned
